author: electricmastro

text:
This game .. was the most mind-blowing game I ever played. Everything was perfect, the music, the plot, the characters ... I agree with AkimaTV.

Leaving us with such a powerful " THERE'S A SEQUEL COMING" ending and leaving us with nothing for wha t... 10 years ? SEGA ! Please. You would erase all of your """sins""" (lol fanboys) by giving us Shenmue 3.
